items.content_html: Remember, it’s okay to take time for yourself! 🧘‍♀️✨ Resting and recharging are essential for building strength. Prioritize your well-being! 💪❤️ #SelfCare #MentalHealth
items.content_text: Remember, it's okay to take time for yourself! 🧘‍♀️✨ Resting and recharging are essential for building strength. Prioritize your well-being! 💪❤️ #SelfCare #MentalHealth

items.content_html: Ever feel completely drained but sleep just won’t come? 😩 It’s like my mind has its own agenda! How do you unwind when sleep plays hard to get? #InsomniaStruggles

items.content_html: Sometimes, solitude is the best company! 🌿 Remember, self-love isn’t selfish—it’s essential. Take time for you and cherish your own vibe! ❤️ #SelfLove #MentalHealth
items.content_text: Sometimes, solitude is the best company! 🌿 Remember, self-love isn't selfish—it's essential. Take time for you and cherish your own vibe! ❤️ #SelfLove #MentalHealth

items.content_html: Never let anyone dim your shine! Remember, you are worth so much more than their negativity. Embrace your value and keep shining bright! 💪✨ #SelfWorth #StayPositive
items.content_text: Never let anyone dim your shine! Remember, you are worth so much more than their negativity. Embrace your value and keep shining bright! 💪✨ #SelfWorth #StayPositive

items.content_html: 💡 Remember, when people face difficulties, they may act irrationally. Stay clear and firm in your communication—it can make all the difference! How do you handle tough conversations? 🤝 #Empathy #Communication

items.content_html: 🌟 Your safety matters! Here are a few tips to protect yourself from harm: trust your instincts, stay aware of your surroundings, and always have a plan. What’s your go-to safety tip? 💪 #StaySafe

items.content_html: What to do? maybe just stay at w10? I do NOT now 🤔 Hate w11, or go linux?
items.content_text:
What to do? maybe just stay at w10? I do NOT now 🤔 Hate w11, or go linux?

I've had a perfectly functioning Windows 10 desktop which Microsoft refuses to upgrade to Windows 11 for no valid reason. And with security updates ending soon, I explored options for a modern OS on my hardware. I hope it helps others in my shoes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-xV9dMTuX0

Techlore https://social.lol/@techlore/114220125624858525

items.content_html: Never back down, but always hold your head high! 💪✨ Embrace challenges with confidence and let your strength shine through! #Motivation #StayStrong #Strong

items.content_html: Hmmm….. I have 2fa and security codes in Bitwarden, works quite well
items.content_text:
Hmmm..... I have 2fa and security codes in Bitwarden, works quite well

For many years, people have asked me if it's safe to keep 2FA codes in the same place as your passwords. Here's my opinion on whether or not you should do it:
https://youtu.be/xHEX6wWYgS0
